Class LoginView

java.lang.Object
com.panotify.ui.LoginView
public class LoginView extends Object
View class for handling login and registration functionality Provides UI for user authentication and account creation

  • Constructor Details

    • LoginView

      public LoginView(javafx.stage.Stage stage, AuthenticationService authService, javafx.scene.Scene previousScene, LoginView.LoginCallback callback)
      Creates a new LoginView with the necessary dependencies
      Parameters:
      stage - the primary stage for displaying the view
      authService - service for authentication operations
      previousScene - the scene to return to when canceling login
      callback - callback for handling successful login

  • Method Details

    • show

      public void show(String accountType)
      Shows the login view for a specific account type Uses default dimensions for the login window
      Parameters:
      accountType - the type of account (Student or Instructor)

    • show

      public void show(String accountType, int width, int height)
      Shows the login view for a specific account type with custom dimensions
      Parameters:
      accountType - the type of account (Student or Instructor)
      width - the width of the login window
      height - the height of the login window
